title: Cotton Bale
process: We procure cotton directly from farmers with top management involvement to ensure quality from the start. Our expert team of graders and logistics managers oversees the entire production cycle, guaranteeing high-quality cotton and timely delivery year-round.
quality: Our cotton bales are of premium quality, ensuring exceptional durability and purity. The processing involves minimal human intervention, with bull tractors and machines handling cotton heaping and direct transfer to ginning and pressing machines. This automated process results in the finest quality cotton with minimal contamination.
